data.text: @Covid19Critical "Politicians" have nothing to do with doctors who don't use unproven therapies. They don't use them because...they don't work. That's why only a small percentage of doctors are susceptible to your misinformation, thankfully.

@Covid19Critical Suppression of off-label prescribing was an executive overreach that had no basis in law. We need to codify in lawfully legislated statute such that this can never be done again. The disdain for the clinical acumen of astute doctors was as broadly harmful as it was disrespectful.
@Covid19Critical It’s funny that now they’re stepping up when everything is essentially over. Very typical. Too many people died unnecessarily.
@Covid19Critical harassed by primary MD 2021, just saw a new primary yesterday who harassed me again due to No V. I am looking for a new primary, one who is not threatened by the politicians
